code: import axios from'axios';import*as constants from'./constants';var changeLogin=function changeLogin(){return{type:constants.CHANGE_LOGIN,value:true};};export var logout=function logout(){return{type:constants.LOGOUT,value:false};};export var login=function login(account,password){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/api/login.json?account='+account+'&password='+password).then(function(res){var result=res.data.data;if(result){dispatch(changeLogin());}else{alert('登录失败');}});};};
